name: Dark Forest (itch) (segaln17)
description: You are a 15 year old, summering with your parents at the Great Northern Lodge and Resort in the mountains of Maine. This summer, you will discover a monster. In this Twine game, inspired by Monster of the Week and "Choose Your Own Adventure" stories, you will play through the eyes of a completely ordinary kid as they stumble across and uncover the secrets of the resort, and the mountains that tower above it. Will you figure out the monster's weakness, enlist the help of a friend, or take it on alone and unprepared? The choice is yours.
